001public class MagicCookie extends Item {
002
003    public MagicCookie() {
004        super("cookie", "Un cookie magique qui augmente la poids max", 5);
005    }
006
007    @Override
008    public void onUse(Player player) {
009        super.onUse(player);
010        player.setMaxWeight(100);
011    }
012}
